column4: Why is it that DMA defaults to "off" on my CD/DVD[RW]  drives in Breezy?
because some drives break when you turn it on

Ah.  Is there a configuration file, or better yet, GUI, where I can turn it on?  Burning CDs like this is torture, and I don't want to have to enter the same command line on every boot (or start monkeying with init.d)
hrm... shouldn't be too hard to add the command to init.d... search the forums, I'm sure there's a simple to follow howto on this
